name: Duality (itch) (Newfel)
description:
It' s the first game i have developed. It's an endless runner game about getting through obstacles. 

It has some bug that makes some objecst have a color problem and a white silhoutte.It is not intented.

Have Fun

.

Controls: 

Left Mouse Button Hold: Speeding Up

Left Mouse Button Release: Jump

(On Air) Left Mouse Button Press: Down Dash

Music: Lost In The Desert by https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music

Inspirations: Spilled https://nebuch.itch.io/spilled ,

Gone With The Flow https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SonsOfEarthGames.GWTF&hl=tr&gl...
